item.description: Upcoming Events Annual General Meeting 📍 Digital 📅 October 24 2023 18:30 🔗 Facebook event Hub AI is hosting the formal Annual General Meeting which includes the election of the new president and vice president, the election of the new statute and changes in the board. Past Events Large Language Models and the Art of Using ChatGPT in Academia 📍 MA 3: Sölvegatan 20, 223 62 Lund 📅 September 21 2023 17:30 🔗 Facebook event Did you miss our event on ChatGPT last semester?

Get active in the Hub! We offer free membership for all students at Lund University. Register here. You can also get active in the committee team, shape the future of Hub AI, expand your network, and develop professional and soft skills! Hub AI is growing and wants you on board for this exciting journey! Read more and apply here.
